Bas van den Heuvel

Home · About · Publications · Contact

Since October 2019 I am a PhD student at the Bernoulli Institute, University of Groningen (NL) for the VIDI project Unifying Correctness for Communicating Software under the supervision of Jorge A. Pérez.

Currently, I am visiting with Stephanie Balzer at Carnegie Mellon University in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA.
